full_summary:
## Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Procurement Summary

The Department of National Defence (DND) intends to procure two (2) optical telescopes for tracking Low Earth Orbit (LEO) and Deep Space satellites. The telescopes must be compatible with the existing telescope mount, a Planewave L500.

### Contract Scope

The scope of work includes the delivery of two (2) optical telescopes along with their accessories. All deliverables must be ready for shipping no later than 01 Feb 2024.

### Evaluation and Award Criteria

The evaluation criteria include the bidder's ability to meet all technical specifications outlined in Annex "A" - Statement of Requirement, with the lowest-cost compliant proposal receiving the highest ranking.

### Submission Information

This RFP is issued as a request for proposal under the Competitive Bidding Process. Proposals must be submitted in one of the official languages of Canada (English or French).

### Tender Documents

The Request for Proposal (RFP) document, including Annexes, can be accessed through the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell (GCBS) website.

### Contract Award

It is the intention of DND to award a single contract to the bidder that meets the evaluation criteria with the lowest price. However, DND reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement and may not award a contract, regardless of the proposals received.

### Government Trade Agreements

The contract may be subject to the following government trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Contract Duration

The expected contract start date is 11 Sep 2023, with an expected contract end date of 31 Mar 2024.
